global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Slope Sea 2 (SS-2) line 2020-03-02T09:46:04 UTC and recovered 2020-05-22T18:00:27 UTC. The DVL was disabled 2020-04-20 to conserve battery power. The glider was caught in eddies and blown off course multiple times through the deployment. This was a relatively normal deployment.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_376
